item.title: Making barrage freeze and item requirements help
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

server.playerHandler.players[index].entangleDelay = getFreezeTimer(MagicHandler.spellID);

Check the ID of the spell and its entangle delay.

item.title: Making barrage freeze and item requirements help
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

if (MagicHandler.itFreezes && !splash) { if (server.playerHandler.players[index].EntangleDelay <= 0) { server.playerHandler.players[index].lastEntangle = System.currentTimeMillis(); server.playerHandler.players[index].entangleDelay = getFreezeTimer(MagicHandler.spellID); mage.sM("You have been frozen!"); mage.toX = mage.absX; mage.toY = mage.absY; } }[code] its somthing with the entangle delay i think not sure.[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Making barrage freeze and item requirements help

item.title: Making barrage freeze and item requirements help
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

Three Things I need help with

  1. Barrage is not freezing
    2.Multi hit barrage (shows three barrages when its two people)
    3.Item requirments (how do I edit them?) Ex: my d claws need 60 defense not 60 attack? How do i fix that.

How do I make barrage actually freeze? On my server It says it freezes but it actually doesn’t cause you can click right away and walk. Also when i put multi hit in it hits three times when there is only 2 people. This is what i put in for multi hit:

if (spell == 12891 && multiCombat()) { attackPlayersWithin(369, 30, 2);

Barrage freezing? Whats wrong with the following code:

if (MagicHandler.itFreezes && !splash) { if (server.playerHandler.players[index].EntangleDelay <= 0) { server.playerHandler.players[index].lastEntangle = System.currentTimeMillis(); server.playerHandler.players[index].entangleDelay = getFreezeTimer(MagicHandler.spellID); mage.sM("You have been frozen!"); mage.toX = mage.absX; mage.toY = mage.absY; } }

Read full topic
item.source: Making barrage freeze and item requirements help
